snippet: Veteran Mexican border crossers present an enormous challenge to American policymakers, because they continue to head north despite deterrents more severe than at any time in recent history.
lead_paragraph: Veteran Mexican border crossers present an enormous challenge to American policymakers, because they continue to head north despite deterrents more severe than at any time in recent history.

headline.main: In Crossing the Border, the Risks Are More Grave
headline.seo: In Crossing the Border, the Risks Are More Grave
